ClusterPattern.description: Supported Storage Type for HCI Cluster

values.name: Standard
values.description: Standard Cluster.

values.name: Stretch
values.description: Stretch Cluster.

values.name: RackAware
values.description: RackAware Cluster.

DeploymentAdapterPropertyOverrides.description: The network adapter properties to override during deployment of a cluster.

jumboPacket.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

networkDirect.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

networkDirectTechnology.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation. Expected values are 'iWARP', 'RoCEv2', 'RoCE'

intents.description: The network intents assigned to the network reference pattern used for the deployment. Each intent will define its own name, traffic type, adapter names, and overrides as recommended by your OEM.

storageNetworks.description: List of StorageNetworks config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

storageConnectivitySwitchless.description: Defines how the storage adapters between nodes are connected either switch or switch less..

enableStorageAutoIp.description: Optional parameter required only for 3 Nodes switchless deployments. This allows users to specify IPs and Mask for Storage NICs when Network ATC is not assigning the IPs for storage automatically.

name.description: Name of the network intent you wish to create.

trafficType.description: List of network traffic types. Only allowed values are 'Compute', 'Storage', 'Management'.

adapter.description: Array of network interfaces used for the network intent.

overrideVirtualSwitchConfiguration.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

overrideQosPolicy.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

overrideAdapterProperty.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

values.name: Validate
values.description: Validate ECE action deployment for a cluster.

values.name: Deploy
values.description: Deploy ECE action deployment for a cluster.

ipv4Address.description: The IPv4 address assigned to network adapter used for storage.

subnetMask.description: The SubnetMask address assigned to network adapter used for storage.

networkAdapterName.description: Name of the storage network adapter.

vlanId.description: ID specified for the VLAN storage network. This setting is applied to the network interfaces that route the storage and VM migration traffic.

storageAdapterIPInfo.description: List of Storage adapter physical nodes config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

loadBalancingAlgorithm.description: Load Balancing Algorithm for Virtual Switch

EceActionStatus.description: Validation / deployment status details for Job.

steps.description: List of steps of Edge device job.

EdgeDeviceKind.description: Edge device type based on host OS installed.

values.name: HCI
values.description: Arc-enabled edge device with HCI OS.

values.name: WindowsServer
values.description: Arc-enabled edge device with WindowsServer OS.

values.name: WindowsIoT
values.description: Arc-enabled edge device with WindowsIoT OS.

values.name: AzureLinux
values.description: Arc-enabled edge device with AzureLinux OS.

values.name: UbuntuLinux
values.description: Arc-enabled edge device with UbuntuLinux OS.

values.name: AzureLinuxRoe
values.description: Arc-enabled edge device with Azure Linux restricted operating environment.

values.name: WindowsServer
values.description: Edge solution for Windows based edge devices.

values.name: AzureLinux
values.description: Edge solution for Azure linux edge devices.

values.name: ActiveDirectory
values.description: Active Directory as the Identity Provider. This is the default option.

values.name: LocalIdentity
values.description: Use local identity with Azure Keyvault

JobReportedProperties.description: Reported Properties for job triggered from cloud.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

JobStatus.description: Represents the various statuses a job can have throughout its lifecycle.

values.name: NotSpecified
values.description: The job status has not been specified.

values.name: ValidationInProgress
values.description: The job is currently undergoing validation.

values.name: ValidationSuccess
values.description: The job has successfully passed validation.

values.name: ValidationFailed
values.description: The job has failed validation.

values.name: DeploymentInProgress
values.description: The job's deployment is currently in progress.

values.name: DeploymentFailed
values.description: The job's deployment has failed.

values.name: DeploymentSuccess
values.description: The job has been successfully deployed.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The job has succeeded.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The job has failed.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The job has been canceled.

values.name: Paused
values.description: The job is paused.

values.name: Scheduled
values.description: The job is scheduled to run.

LocalAvailabilityZoneMode.description: Local Availability Zone Mode for HCI cluster.

values.name: Active
values.description: Local Availability Zone in active mode.

values.name: Passive
values.description: Local Availability Zone in passive mode.

LocalAvailabilityZones.description: Local Availability Zone information for HCI cluster

localAvailabilityZoneName.description: Local Availability Zone name for HCI cluster

localAvailabilityZoneMode.description: Local Availability Zone Mode for HCI cluster. Can be active or passive.

nodes.description: Nodes belonging to a particular zone

LogCollectionStatus.description: Represents the status of a log collection operation.

values.name: None
values.description: Indicates that no log collection operation has been initiated.

values.name: InProgress
values.description: Indicates that the log collection operation is currently in progress.

values.name: Failed
values.description: Indicates that the log collection operation has failed.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Indicates that the log collection operation has completed successfully.

ProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of a resource.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Resource has been created.

values.name: Failed
values.description: Resource creation failed.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: Resource creation was canceled.

values.name: NotSpecified
values.description: The resource provision state is not specified

values.name: Provisioning
values.description: The resource is being provisioned

values.name: Updating
values.description: The resource is updating

values.name: Deleting
values.description: The resource is being deleted

values.name: Accepted
values.description: The resource create request has been accepted

priorityValue8021Action_Cluster.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

priorityValue8021Action_SMB.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

bandwidthPercentage_SMB.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

RemoteSupportAccessLevel.description: Defines the level of remote support access granted.

values.name: None
values.description: No remote support access is granted.

values.name: Diagnostics
values.description: Access is limited to diagnostics information only.

values.name: DiagnosticsAndRepair
values.description: Access includes diagnostics information and the ability to perform repairs.

RemoteSupportType.description: Defines the type of remote support action to be performed on an edge device.

values.name: Enable
values.description: Enables remote support for the edge device.

values.name: Revoke
values.description: Revokes previously granted remote support access for the edge device.

startTimeUtc.description: Start time in utc of step.

endTimeUtc.description: End time in utc of step.

status.description: Status of step. Allowed values are 'Error', 'Success', 'InProgress'

steps.description: List of nested steps during job execution..

exception.description: List of exceptions in job execution.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.description: Represents the behavior of the automatic upgrades of the extension.

lcmUpdate.description: Represents the behavior of the lcm update of the extension.

ValidatedSolutionRecipeComponentPayload.description: Represents payloads associated with a component available in a validated solution recipe.

info.description: Represents information about a validated solution recipe.

capabilities.description: Represents capabilities available in a validated solution recipe.

components.description: Represents components available in a validated solution recipe.

solutionType.description: Represents the solution type for which this validated solution recipe is applicable.

version.description: Represents the version for which this validated solution recipe is applicable.

value.description: The ValidatedSolutionRecipe items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items
